=== About myself ===
I am a Ubuntu user since 6.06, and I recently began to contribute to Ubuntu by means of bug triaging and some code.
Apart from that, I am also a high school student who dreams of pursuing his studies in France.

=== Occupations ===
* Bug triaging as part of the Ubuntu Bug Squad.
* Gaming on my DS and Wii.

=== Plans ===
* Apply to the Ubuntu Bug Control team -> DONE.
* Contributing more code.
* Do my best to attend important meetings (at least remotely).
* Make it at the top of this list: https://edge.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+topcontributors
